name: CrushingInjury
title: Crushing injury
description: OP-10 and OP-11 are the measure IDs associated with the codes.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains ICD-10 codes associated with crushing injury of an unspecified hip with thigh.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a crushing injury of an unspecified hip with thigh.),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-10 codes associated with a crushing injury of an unspecified hip with thigh are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Values that are not related to a crushing injury of an unspecified hip with thigh, or those captured in systems other than ICD-10, are excluded from the value set.)
